name: Pluto Becomes a Planet
description:
[The downloadable version is way more consistent and bug-free than the web version even though they're both basically the same in content]

Press Space to go through dialogue.

Pluto had always been considered a planet

...until 2006.

Upon that dreadful August, the world knew at last Pluto's malice.

Pluto first attempts to clear his orbit of neighboring asteroids, but he soon realizes the dark truth behind his demotion... (latter in full release)
